wikipedia_page.main: Aloysius "Ally" McGowan (22 January 1930 – 5 July 2005) was a Scottish former footballer, who played as a defender.

response: His younger brother Ally McGowan was also a footballer, who played mainly for Wrexham.My advice to Thistle, Evening Times, 6 July 1957 (via Partick Thistle History Archive)
